sections.text: Act; applicability.Nothing contained in the Political Subdivisions Tort Claims Act and sections 16-727, 16-728, 23-175, 39-809, and 79-610 shall be deemed to repeal or restrict any provision of law authorizing any political subdivision to consider, ascertain, adjust, compromise, settle, determine, allow, or pay any claim other than a tort claim as defined in such act and sections.SourceLaws 1969, c. 138, ยง 18, p. 634;R.S.1943, (1983), ยง 23-2418;Laws 1996, LB 900, ยง 1032.
